welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Cape Coral! Get ready to soak up the sun, relax on beautiful beaches, and explore the city's renowned canal system. We hope you enjoy your stay and make the most of all that Cape Coral has to offer."

restaurants.name: Carrabba's Italian Grill
restaurants.description: Carrabba's Italian Grill is a italian restaurant located in Cape Coral.
restaurants.address: 762 SW Pine Island Rd, Cape Coral, FL 33991

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Page Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private flights and offers exclusive amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southwest Florida International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Southwest Florida International Airport serves domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Southwest Florida International Airport serves domestic flights for Delta, United, and American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte County Airport serves all commercial flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
